cards.name: Gorger
cards.description: Gorger is a mysterious pokemon that loves a challenge. It spends its days scouring the canyon-like terrain for challengers to test its Strike ability on. Adventurous and rambunctious, it can often be found scaling the steep cliffs and walls of its canyon home. With its sharp claws, Gorger is a fierce fighter, often coming out victorious in its encounters with its opponents.
cards.image_prompt: Gorger::0 a basic fighting-type punch pokemon, in a canyon environment, red and purple ambient lighting, anime sketch --niji --ar 3:2
